name: Angry at Zombz
description:
Difficult balancing game of making choices on where to spend your mistakes. Come beat up zombies while trying to keep your fear in check and your anger as high as possible. 

You get anger (health)  for killing zombies with left mouse click (pretty forgiving collision)  and for jumping over hazards.  You will increase your fear if you don't kill a zombie or if you hit a hazard.  This is a balancing game of staying alive since there are a LOT of hazards and zombies.
